entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18 except minus 8 over western sections.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 except minus 8 over western sections. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
